Posts.EditableText: I want to disable the map in my game with a script during longer passages so there is more room to display text, is there a way to use a script to activate the map or maybe move it to one of the panes?
Posts.HTML: I want to disable the map in my game with a script during longer passages so there is more room to display text, is there a way to use a script to activate the map or maybe move it to one of the panes?

Posts.EditableText:
You can hide the map with 
JS.ShowGrid (1)

Best ist to save the original size with 
game.originalsize=game.mapsize

and then restore it with
JS.ShowGrid (game.originalsize)
